revised_title: The Development of Phonological Skills and Its Impact on Reading
tldr: This article explores the development of phonological skills in children and their relationship to reading development. It discusses the importance of input and output phonological processes, the refinement of phonological representations over time, and the impact of phonological skills on vocabulary acquisition and literacy. The article also highlights the differences in phonological development between good and poor readers, as well as children with dyslexia.
